name: langflow-clone
description: Visual AI workflow builder inspired by LangFlow

scripts.install:all: cd backend && poetry install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name 'node_modules' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
